title: Reciting the dua of New Moon at beginning of every month (is the dua authentic?) assim al hakeem
transcript: so sh is it from to see new moon every month and to say mo Dua is this authentic also Thea authentic or not this is a diff an issue of dispute among Scholars some authenticate it and some say that it is a weak Dua and it depends on the Sheikh you follow in authentication uh I personally don't believe that it is authentic but those who want to say it say that it is not connected to issues of and the Dua is not connected to Halal andam therefore there is nothing uh harmful in saying it even if it is a weak Dua and Allah Knows Best
